title: Was the Parthenon in Nashville visible from I-40 in 1969? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, never. This life-sized replica isn’t situated high on a hill, like the Acropolis in Athens. It’s in the old Centennial Fair grounds, a flat plain now known as Centennial Park. It’s surrounded by hills, including a low ridge separating the highway from the Parthenon.
